stories.title: First Impressions of Icon Class Ship (TBN 2027)

stories.core_insight: Icon Class Ship (TBN 2027) delivers a memorable cruise experience with Royal Caribbean International

First-time cruisers will appreciate the intuitive layout—you'll find your way around within the first day. The crew goes out of their way to ensure guests feel welcomed and oriented.

For those considering Icon Class Ship (TBN 2027), research the deck plans and dining options before you board. Knowing the ship's layout in advance enhances your experience significantly.
